page.title: 12LOCAL NEWS CONTINUED
page.content: THE THIRD IMPORTANT EVENT WAS THAT ON SATURDAY 4TH MAY THE ROYAL ARMY ORDNANCE CORPS WAS GIVEN THE FREEDOM OF ENTRY TO THE TOWN (THE RIGHT TO MARCH THROUGH IT WITH FIXED BAYONETS).THE ARMY IS BASED IN VAUXHALL BARRACKS. IN ONE SAMPLE WEEK,THE MAIN EVENT IN MOST OF THE PAPERS WAS WHEN OXFORD HOLIDAYMAKERS WERE INVOLVED IN A TEN-HOUR SEA DRAMA WHEN THEIR HYDROFOIL WAS CRIPPLED BY A WHALE AS THEY RETURNED FROM A WEEK -LONG TRIP TO GUERNSEY. OTHER ITEMS IN THE MERCURY THAT WEEK WERE:REPORTS ON FETES,PLAYS,OPERAS,SPORT,ADVERTS..LESS IMPORTANT STORIES :HOUSES FOR SALE;LETTERS:DIDCOT GIRLS'SCHOOL INSIGHT INTO INDUSTRY COURSE;WEDDINGS;CROSSWORD,T.V.NEWS,LOC AL DIARY.
